title: Spacious 1 Bedroom w/ Large Patio AVL NOW, 370B
posting_body: ['One Bedroom Apartment in Adams Point w/ Huge Patio', 'Property Address', '370 Staten Ave | Apt B | Oakland, CA 94610', 'Available:', '06/15/2022', 'Offered By', '370 Staten LLC', '1 Mo Free!Lease rent is $2,395, net effective over 12 month term with 1 month free is $2,195!', 'Description', 'A cozy 15-unit building, located in a quiet neighborhood, an easy walk to Lake Merritt, Whole Foods, BART, and downtown Oakland.', 'This building has brightly-lit corridors, laundry room with new machines, and secure underground parking.', 'Apartments feature hardwood and tile floors, renovated kitchen with granite countertops, new windows, renovated bathrooms, extra insulation for sound and temperature control, energy-efficient lighting, and private balcony or patio.', 'Security and safety features include new video surveillance system, enhanced exterior security lighting, and a centrally-monitored fire alarm.', 'KEY FEATURES', 'Bedrooms: 1 Bed', 'Bathrooms: 1 Bath', 'Parking: Garage (See Details Below)', 'Lease Duration: 12 Months', 'Pets Policy: Pets Under 80 lbs Welcome (See Details Below)', 'Laundry: Shared, Coin Operated', 'Floor: 1st', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'RENTAL FEATURES', 'Living room', 'Range / Oven', 'Refrigerator', 'Dishwasher', 'Microwave', 'Cable-ready', 'Intercom system', 'Hardwood floor', 'Tile floor', 'Granite countertop', 'BUILDING FEATURES', 'Seismically Retrofit', 'Controlled access', 'On-street parking', 'Off-street Parking', 'LEASE TERMS', 'Pet: $75-100 added to the base month per pet', 'Water and garbage are passed through based on occupancy and usage', 'Attached garage parking is available for an additional fee', 'Smoking is not permitted on the premises.', "NOTE: The City of Oakland's Fair Chance Housing Ordinance requires that rental housing providers display this notice to applicants - <URL> Ordinance.Tenant-Notice.10.5.2020.pdf", 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 1BD/1.0BA', 'Square Feet: 650', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $2,395.00', 'Available:', '06/15/2022', 'Application Fee: $45.00', 'Security Deposit: $4,790.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats allowed', 'Dogs allowed', 'schedule a tour at your convenience: <URL>']
